body:
I believe you want the divs to display in rows and wrap like table cells. Something like this.

CSS:

div.container {
  width: 100%;
  border: 1px solid;
  color: white;
}
div.container div {
  background: grey;
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 1px 1px 0 0;
}
div.container.three-per-row div {
  width: calc(100%/3 - 2px);
}
div.container.four-per-row div {
  width: calc(100%/4 - 2px);
}

This is compiled. JSBIN link is SCSS.
title: How to display div inside another div like table with some row and column dynamically?
